## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 15,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | The recommended order size ensures sufficient inventory to meet the forecasted demand for the next 5 days, taking into account a margin of error.  It considers the current stock level, lead time, and allows for potential demand fluctuations. Ordering 15,000 units also maximizes the discount opportunity without exceeding the planned purchase quantity.  |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | The recommended order size is 5,000 units lower than the player's planned purchase, which may help to reduce excess inventory and optimize stock turnover. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | Approximately 5 days (calculated based on the recommended order size and forecasted demand) |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5 days (ensuring sufficient stock to cover the next 5 days of forecasted demand) |
| Comments                          | The recommended order size leverages the vendor's available order quantities and aligns with the discount threshold to maximize cost savings. The recommended order size also accounts for the lead time, allowing for sufficient time to receive the order before the predicted demand peaks. This recommendation aims to strike a balance between meeting demand, minimizing excess inventory, and maximizing potential cost savings. |
